definitions.title: n.[f.]
definitions.body: only dual, loins (as seat of strength, vigour; cf. Aram. [[חֲרְחָא]] hip, loin, Syr. h.as.o0, Nö:ZMG 1886, 741)—[[חֲלָחָָיִם]] Is 32:11; sf. [[חֲלָחֶיךָ]] Ge 35:11 + 4 t.; [[חֲלָחָיו]] Is 5:27 + 2 t.; [[חלחו]] Kt Job 31:20, Qr [[חֲלָחָיו]];—loins:
as seat of virility ´[[יחא מן ח]] Ge 35:11 (P), 1Ki 8:19, 2Ch 6:9.

as girded [[אֱזׇר־]] ´[[נׇא כְּגֶבֶר ח]] Job 38:3, Job 40:7; [[אֵזוֹר חֲלָחָיו]] Is 5:27 (v. [[אֵזוֹר]]), [[וַחֲג֫וֹרָה עַל חֲלָחָָיִם]] Is 32:11, cf. Job 31:20 where the clothed loins are conceived as blessing charitable giver; metaph. Is 11:5 faithfulness waist-cloth of his loins (‖[[מתניו]]).
as seat of pains, like a woman's in travail, Je 30:6.
